# This page has information about me

My name is Wenyu Zhang, and I am a first year master student of biostatistics in Columbia University's Mailman School of Public Health.I got my bachelor degree of pharmaceutical science in the Ohio State University, Columbus, Ohio.

I am very interested in data analysis using Rstudio, SAS. And I also want to learn how to combine data analysis with my pharmaceutical science knowledge.

Feel free to check more information about my academic career in [Wenyu' resume](Resume-Wenyu Zhang (WZ2591).pdf)
